data.text: @candygramfmongo @libsoftiktok So edgy. And in this world too. Reddits that 👉🏼way bro

@libsoftiktok Sure she has right to free speech, but the school has a right to fire her also. That's how jobs work.

@randy_monahan @libsoftiktok A terrible idea Randy! You don't know their thoughts or hearts. If I came up to you and started talking....you now agree with everything I said?

Shame on you.

You're effectively promoting cancel culture & it harms free speech everywhere.

Cancel culture is EVIL. Delete this
@TrinityIG79 @SpaceCowboy83 @libsoftiktok Now it gets it twice in a month- last being across the street from the synagogue.

@libsoftiktok If the other two with her are teachers they should be “resigned” too. They clearly were not offended by her statement nor did they report what she said to supervisors. If that were said about liberal groups they would have and she would have been fired. Their silence is condoning
